title: Returned Text
text: The returned text is determined by what is written in the SELECT clause, not what is specified in the FROM clause.

title: Using the FROM clause
text: The FROM clause for the table "Items" is only referring to the singular column, so the number of results corresponds with the number of rows in the column.

title: String Literal
text: Since "Name" is in quotes, it is interpreted as the text and not the field (column) name with the same name.

title: Return from SELECT function
text: The Select function will return the "Name" text corresponding to the number of items in the column in the table.
